posts.post_content:

Still need: Piedmont 350 and SC 150 #30....also wouldn't mind upgrading my SC 350 #25

[STRIKE]•EPDG[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]•Hindu

•SC 150 #30
[STRIKE]•SC 350 #25[/STRIKE]--could update

Also one of my favorite portraits.

Good luck with the hunt.

[quote name="sreader3" post=1418041]

Good luck with the hunt.[/QUOTE]

That's just mean, flaunting that.

I guess I can share my beater....one of my fave portraits too

[quote name="Thromdog" post=1418056]That's just mean, flaunting that.[/QUOTE]

Too hard to resist.  :)

Picked Mr. Kling up raw on ebay in 2004 before everyone clued in how tough 150/350 subjects are with OM.  Ah, the good ole days.

Sorry for the hijack.

Grrr now I'm having some serious Old Mill envy.  :cool:

Anyone at least have a Sov 150 they are willing to pony up?
Sorry, not to rub it in, but figured I would contribute to the "show your Kling" thread :-)

Bump. Still looking, especially for the OM and EPDG. Anyone willing to part?
